summary: A Flax module that wraps the ELECTRA transformer architecture for token-level classification, managing model initialization and executing the forward pass to produce per-token logits.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use ELECTRA‑based solution in the Flax/JAX ecosystem for token classification tasks such as named‑entity recognition or part‑of‑speech tagging, facilitating fine‑tuning and inference.
